alert.note: Alert for Dalton Highway Summits (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 30 at 2:32AM AKST until January 31 at 3:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility expected and very cold wind chills expected. Additional snow accumulations of 2 inches. Visibility one half mile or less at times. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. Very cold wind chills to 55 below. * WHERE...Dalton Highway Summits. * WHEN...Until 3 AM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Areas of blowing snow will reduce visibility. Snow drifts will form. Wind chills to 55 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
